effect.Name: Division With Floating Modulus
effect.description: Division With Floating Modulus - Shader divides base and blend colors with each other then colors are calculated by floating modulus
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Division With Floating Modulus (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader divides base and blend colors with each other then colors are calculated by floating modulus

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable decides which color the divider should be. When the option is off, the divisor is the background colors and when the option is on, the divisor is the object colors

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility

parameter.name: Denom
parameter.description: This variable is the color divisor
